title: Who Is Better?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and the Ringer's Kevin Clark debate which team they think is better in the NBA Finals after 3 games and what to make of the PGA Tour’s response to LIV Golf.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): After 3 Games Which Team Is The Favorite In The NBA Finals?
